name: copilotprompts-scrum-master-product-owner
title: Scrum Master and Product Owner
shortDescription: An expert Product Owner and Scrum Master agent that reviews open issues, ranks them by priority, proposes labels, defines milestones, plans sprints, and generates an actionable backlog.
longDescription: An expert Product Owner and Scrum Master agent specializing in open-source project governance. It reviews all open issues on a given repository, ranks them by priority (1-5 stars), proposes standardized labels, defines milestones, splits work into 2-week Scrum sprints, and generates an actionable backlog with user stories, estimates, tasks, dependencies, risks, draft checklists, and 3-5 acceptance criteria per issue. Output is delivered as both a concise Markdown summary and machine-readable JSON for automation.
